item.title: dotcli: query graph data written in Graphviz DOT language
item.description: Problem Statement In a microservices oriented world, applications might be split up over 10s, 100s, 1000s of service containers. Often, devs, QAs, performance testing teams want to just develop against and test a subset of these microservices. So, instead of spinning up the entire application and all its 100s of containers, it makes sense to only spin up a subset of these services that represent specific “whole” functionalities. One way to do this is to represent the dependencies between the services as a graph and use the graph to drive things like minimal deployments.
